name: .WK3 File Extension
summary: Learn about .WK3 files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Spreadsheet file created by Lotus 1-2-3, version 3; stores data in cells, which are organized into a grid of rows and columns; may be used for a variety of data-entry purposes.

content: You can open WK3 files with IBM Lotus 1-2-3 and Microsoft Excel. However, IBM Lotus 1-2-3 is discontinued and Excel 2007 and later does not support WK3 files.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
